item.title: By: Alan Head
item.dc:creator: Alan Head
item.description: <p>I use it a lot, great for keeping up with how badly the Mariners and Cubs are doing (as usual). Also the integration with search history is useful, as is time to home/work for commuting and the usual stock tracking. I blogged about how to get your Notes calendar synced to GMail (one way only) so you can use it to remind you about meetings and provide travel times/maps/etc. here https://www.evernote.com/shard/s199/sh/01351fc7-7711-4f60-aab6-cbe65500672d/a7a0d4002242165d5b0fcadfbbbeea7d</p>
